slide1_description: Stay informed with credible sources. We bring you the latest, unbiased updates from trusted voices around the globe.
slide2_description: Unlock new dimensions of imagination and skill. Dive into creative pursuits that challenge boundaries and inspire innovation.
slide3_description: Writing that goes beyond words. Engage with narratives that capture experiences, convey messages, and resonate deeply.

section1.title: Read what matters to you from diverse cultural work, inspire with yours
section1.description: Engage with writings from diverse experiences, stay informed with the latest happenings, and share your own thoughts.

section2.title: Find your favorite topics
section2.description: Follow topics that matter to you, customize your feed, and dive into stories that align with your passions and curiosities.

section3.title: Communiques
section3.description: Care about national alerts? Be the first to get them. Stay informed with real-time notices and updates from trusted sources.

GenericErrorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.
NetworkErrorMessage: Oops! Looks like you’re offline. Check your connection and try again.
AuthErrorMessage: Incorrect phone number or password. Please try again.
NotFoundErrorMessage: We couldn’t find an account with that phone number.
ServerErrorMessage: Our servers are having a moment. Please try again soon!
RateLimitErrorMessage: Too many login attempts! Please wait a bit and try again.
UnexpectedErrorMessage: Something unexpected happened during login. Please try again.
